All Classes|All Packages

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class TicTacToe
Activates the tic-tac-toe game
MainScreen - Class in gui
Class implementing the main window of the system, displaying the tic tac toe board alongside some details regarding the game (such as the description of the intelligence level, the decision time of the agent, the move sequence of the agent and player, and the number of wins and draws of both parties)
MainScreen() - Constructor for class gui.MainScreen
Creates the main window of the system, displaying the tic tac toe board alongside some details regarding the game
MainScreenController - Class in controller
Class providing the controller for the processes related to the main screen of the system (that is, the tic-tac-toe board together with the pertinent details and statistics)
MainScreenController(MainScreen, GameMaster) - Constructor for class controller.MainScreenController
Creates a controller object with the GUI for the main screen and the game master as parameters
makeMove(int, int, char) - Method in class gui.MainScreen
Updates the display to reflect a move by either the player or the agent
makeMove(int, int, char) - Method in class tic_tac_toe.Board
Updates the board state to reflect the most recent move given the row- and column-coordinates of the move, and the character code of the pertinent player
makeMove(int, int, char) - Method in class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Updates the board state to reflect the most recent move given the row- and column-coordinates of the move, and the character code of the pertinent player
moveComputer() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Handles both front- and back-end processes related to a move by the tic-tac-toe-playing agent
moveHuman(int, int) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Handles both front- and back-end processes related to a move by the human player
